title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the MarketMLSuite project. This includes detailed features, functionalities, security considerations, data privacy needs, and performance expectations. Prioritize requirements based on business value and usability. Include use cases, edge cases, and error handling scenarios. Emphasize on the integration of our platform with buyers' private clouds, ensuring data privacy, intellectual property protection, and seamless user experience.

title: Design System Architecture for MarketMLSuite
description: Design the overall system architecture for the MarketMLSuite, including components, interactions, and data flow. The design should focus on enabling buyers to consume sellers' applications in their own private cloud while ensuring data privacy and intellectual property protection.

title: Develop Comprehensive Security and Privacy Strategies
description: Craft comprehensive strategies and mechanisms to ensure data privacy, protect intellectual property, maintain overall system security, and establish a secure data transfer methodology. This should include encryption techniques, access controls, incident response plans, and disaster recovery strategies. The focus will also be on implementing best practices for secure coding, data storage, and application hardening.

title: Design User Interface and Experience - MarketMLSuite (Updated)
description: Design the user interface and user experience for both buyers and sellers. This includes usability, accessibility, performance optimizations, security considerations, edge cases, compatibility with various devices and screen sizes. Consider using responsive design principles to ensure optimal display on diverse devices. Prioritize data privacy and intellectual property protection in the UI/UX design. Also, include interactions for handling errors, notifications, and feedback mechanisms. Ensure that the design is adaptable to different user roles (buyer, seller) and can be easily extended or modified as needed.

title: Plan Infrastructure and Deployment for MarketMLSuite
description: Plan and design the infrastructure and deployment strategies for the private cloud environment of MarketMLSuite, ensuring scalability, availability, security, monitoring, and maintenance. Consider integrating containerization technologies like Docker or Kubernetes for increased flexibility and ease of management. Also, prioritize data privacy and intellectual property protection mechanisms, such as data encryption and access control.
